page.title: 08PUDDLING,TATSFIELD POND.
page.content: The village pond was dry and all untidy and the village had a meeting in the hall and they decided to get some men to help them.And this is where the fun came.Daddy let me help him and there was a digger and a big lorry to bring in the clay.We put the clay in the bottom of the pond and trod on it with our boots on.This was called PUDDLING. I fell in and got covered with clay on the side and then we put some straw on. Then the fire engine came to fill it up with water.The village is going to buy some new ducks to go in the new pond because the others were taken by foxes. By Adam Tindall aged 5 years.
